mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring_ch4.board (title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, up_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{viewCnt}, #{commentCnt}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, up_date FROM spring_ch4.board WHERE bno = #{bno}
SELECT bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, up_date FROM spring_ch4.board ORDER BY reg_date DESC, bno DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, up_date FROM spring_ch4.board
mapper.update: UPDATE spring_ch4.board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, view_cnt = #{viewCnt}, comment_cnt = #{commentCnt}, up_date = NOW() WHERE bno = #{bno}
UPDATE spring_ch4.board SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
